thread.title: Fake news! Mabala Noise 'paid' Moreki hitmaker to skip Metro FM Awards
thread.title_full: Fake news! Mabala Noise 'paid' Moreki hitmaker to skip Metro FM Awards

title: Fake news! Mabala Noise 'paid' Moreki hitmaker to skip Metro FM Awards
text:
13 pictures of Trevor Noah's new R130 million Manhattan apartment 
A report that is currently doing the rounds on social media claimed that Monada was given a "Vrr Phaa" in exchange to not attend the awards. 
The article stated that Mabala Noise was afraid that King Monada would steal the show if he attended. 
Mabala Noise spokesperson Mhlo Gumede shared the report on social media and said that he thought he had seen it all. 
"And I thought I had seen it all," he said. Feb 27, 2017 at 10:12am PST 

The 'fake news' comes just days after King Monada revealed that his two-year-old son was fighting for his life in hospital. 
Kgothatso Junior was hospitalised a week go for a "mystery illness". 13 pictures of Trevor Noah's new R130 million Manhattan apartment 
"It was my first time seeing him cry like that for his son. He is hurting. So we have decided to block his gigs until the child is better. It's frustrating to watch a child that ill and we wish we could help," King Monada's manager Lionel Jamela told Sowetan . Share
